articles.description: Without specifying the athletes' nationalities, Governor Ganjar Pranowo said that it was likely that they became infected on their way to the Games.
articles.content:
August 3, 2022
JAKARTA – Eleven swimmers at the ASEAN Para Games (APG), which are being held in Central Java, have contracted COVID-19, Governor Ganjar Pranowo said on Tuesday. One athlete is being … [+1126 chars]
